import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import Navbar from "../../components/navigation/skrallgaming/Navbar"; import { Checkbox } from "../../components" import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/calculator.css" export default function Calculator(){ const { players } = usePlayers() const [ selectedPlayers , setSelectedPlayers ] = useState([undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined]) const [ winningPercentage , SetWinningPercentage ] = useState(undefined) const [ gamesWon , setGamesWon ] = useState([]) const [ gameType , setGameType ] = useState("smash2") const FindPlayer = (id, playerName) => { const player = players.find(player => player.name === playerName) let newSelectedPlayers = [...selectedPlayers] newSelectedPlayers[id] = player setSelectedPlayers(newSelectedPlayers) } const playerOptions = () => { //Denna körs för mkt, kör i en useEffect på ngt sätt istället.. return( <> { players && players.length > 0 && players.map(player => ( )) } ) } const getRating = (id) => { if (gameType === "beerPong") return selectedPlayers[id]?.beerPong ?? 1500 else return selectedPlayers[id]?.rating ?? 1500 } useEffect(() => { if (gameType !== "smash1" && selectedPlayers.includes(undefined)) return if (gameType === "smash1" && (selectedPlayers[0] === undefined || selectedPlayers[2] === undefined)) return if (gameType === "beerPong") SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, ( (selectedPlayers[2]?.beerPong ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[3]?.beerPong ?? 1500) - ((selectedPlayers[0]?.beerPong ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[1]?.beerPong ?? 1500)) ) / 400)))*100)) else if (gameType === "smash1") SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, ((selectedPlayers[2]?.rating ?? 1500) - (selectedPlayers[0]?.rating ?? 1500)) / 400)))*100)) else SetWinningPercentage(parseInt((1 / (1 + Math.pow(10, ( (selectedPlayers[2]?.rating ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[3]?.rating ?? 1500) - ((selectedPlayers[0]?.rating ?? 1500) + (selectedPlayers[1]?.rating ?? 1500)) ) / 400)))*100)) }, [selectedPlayers, gameType] ) return <>

Team 1

{gameType !== "smash1" && } {gameType !== "smash1" && }
{getRating(0)}
{getRating(1)}
Average Rating {(getRating(0) + getRating(1)) / 2}
Win Percentage {winningPercentage}%

{gameType !== "smash1" && } {gameType !== "smash1" && }
{getRating(2)}
{getRating(3)}
Average Rating {(getRating(2) + getRating(3)) / 2}
Win Percentage {100 - winningPercentage}%

Match results
